programme.title: MXP: Most Xtreme Primate
programme.desc: After an exciting career playing professional hockey and busting tricks with the world’s best skateboarders, Jack is back at the El Simian nature preserve. Jack likes hanging around but soon he grows tired of life at the preserve. Trying to liven things up, Julie, the caretaker, organizes a family vacation to Mexico. But then, Jack gets separated from the group and ends up on the wrong plane to Colorado!! Lost and confused, Jack meets up with Pete, a snowboarder, and his rocker brother Jay, who try to help Jack find his family.

programme.title: Pup Star: World Tour
programme.desc: Pup Star is back and bigger than ever as the hit singing-pup competition show goes global! After achieving international stardom, Tiny the adorable Yorkie joins the celebrity judges for the first-ever Pup Star World Tour. The judges each welcome their favourite contestant from around the world to the Pup Star pack, training them to compete for the new title of global pup star champion. India's Raji joins Team Growl, China's Ming joins Team Paw-Paw, Nigeria's Mobo joins Team Gnarley, and Mexico's dashing telenovela star Julio joins Team Tiny.

programme.title: The Duke
programme.desc: The faithful canine companion to the Duke of Dingwall, Hubert, inherits the Duke’s estate and turns the world of high society upside down. With Hubert’s new legal guardian being the Butler’s niece, this unlikely duo have a hard time fitting into their new world. The Duke’s conniving nephew believes the two to be a royal pain and will stop at no cost to steal the inheritance, even if it means marrying into the “Dukedome” via their pet poodle. A dog’s tale of love and devotion that will have your family sitting up and begging for more!

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

The dynamite pairing of Buddy and Josh help carry the Timberwolves to the state championship. All is well until two wicked Russian circus owners show up to dognap Buddy to be their star attraction. A movie that is a touchdown for the entire family!

programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: War Matters
programme.desc: War Matters is a character driven documentary by London based production company CY Film Productions. The film chronicles 10 years of anti-war protest in the city of London through the story of Brian Haw, a veteran peace campaigner who challenged the UK Government's Middle East policy for over 10 years. The documentary also examines the British arms trade and the repercussions of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars around the world.

programme.title: The Age of Robots

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Cromwells Head

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China | Season 1 | Episode 1
programme.desc: SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure in Shandong Province, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a bizarre, wriggly local speciality explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village, famous for its seaweed-roofed cottages.

programme.title: A Model Adventure Season 1 Episode 1 - Off-Road Racing
programme.desc: Catwalk model Kate Peck joins the Chapman Racing Team as Navigator alongside Driver Clayton Chapman as they overcome outback bull dust and breakdowns to reach speeds of up to 200km p/hr in an attempt to win at the Kalgoorlie 400, on the first leg of the Australian Off-road Racing Championships.

programme.title: A Model Adventure Season 1 Episode 2 - Canyoning
programme.desc: Catwalk model Kate Peck attempts to cure herself of her fear of heights by learning to abseil for a canyoning expedition that sees her attempt to take on Kanangra – Australia’s toughest canyon that only the most experienced would ever dare brave.

programme.title: Deeper - The Adventure of Ultra Deep Diving
programme.desc: There are more people who have walked on the surface of the Moon than people who have dived below a depth of 800 feet. Pascal Bernabé is one of them. In 1996, still unknown to the public, he accepts to dive 577 feet deep to bring back two robots trapped in a cave. The mission is a success. But Pascal wants more, he becomes addicted to ultra-deep diving. Soon, he makes a new successful attempt to go below 660 feet.

programme.title: Australian Penguins
programme.desc: Little Penguins are the smallest penguin in the world and are the only species that live and breed in Australia. This documentary focuses on the penguin colony that live on Western Australia's, Penguin Island. The island's Discovery Centre houses a small group of rescued penguins, which have either been injured, orphaned or abandoned as chicks. Australian Penguins gives an insight into their amazing stories of survival and all the funny things this group of Little Penguins get up to.

programme.title: Phantoms of The Desert - Asia's Last Cheetahs
programme.desc: The Asiatic Cheetah is a critically endangered species. Only around 100 of these wild cats survive today in Iran. Animal welfare activists have launched a broad rescue mission to save these hunters from extinction.

programme.title: Redesign My Brain | Season 2 | Episode 1
programme.desc: In episode one, Help Me Adapt, Todd uses the latest science to train his brain to become more adaptable. To prove that it’s possible, he risks his life rock climbing blindfolded up a rock-face in Utah’s Moab Desert. He ascends the 120-metre corkscrew summit of the Ancient Art Tower, a feat never before attempted without sight, after only six weeks of training.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China | Season 1 | Episode 2
programme.desc: SerpentZA and Laowhy86 rack up the miles as they travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They spend the night in a themed sex hotel, explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Nicholas And Alexandra The Letters Episode 1
programme.desc: Desde sus brutales asesinatos hace cien años, el mundo ha estado fascinado por el zar Nicolás II y su esposa, la emperatriz Alexandra. A través de las cartas políticamente condenatorias, sexualmente íntimas y personalmente reveladoras de la pareja, este docu-drama de dos partes, presentado por la Dra. Suzannah Lipscomb, explora la compleja historia de amor de Nicholas y Alexandra y el papel de la pareja en el período previo a la Revolución Rusa que llevó a su ejecuciones trágicas.

programme.title: Australia's Camel Man
programme.desc: Afghan Willie explores the outback on his camel train, the limestone formations, the Pinnacles, of Western Australia, The Spirit of Aviation in Bundaberg, with a memorial to aviator Bert Hinkler.

programme.title: Citizen Duane

programme.title: Alien Trespass
programme.desc: After crash landing on the outskirts of a desert town, an alien enlists the help of a local waitress to recapture a monster that has escaped the wreckage of his spaceship in this affectionate, knowing, hilarious send-up of a genreís sillier past.

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Limping Assassin S01 E01
programme.desc: It’s the Commonwealth Conference in Scotland, but there’s intelligence that suggests a planned assassination attempt on The Queen. Taking his new role very seriously, Hubble soon manages to upset foreign ambassadors, colleagues, hotel guests and even the restaurant pianist as he haphazardly carries out his security checks. An attractive woman spells trouble as he gives away vital security information – and soon has to go all out to save her Majesty

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: Bullets Over Broad Street S01 E02
programme.desc: Hubble enlists the help of his aspirant sniffer dog Winston as he continues in his new role of Royal Bodyguard. It’s the Queen’s birthday, but Hubble soon stumbles into calamity and is forced to take a few days break at a health spa – where he comes across a familiar face and his planned relaxation is suddenly shelved. Hubble returns to duty in time to oversee Her Majesty’s visit to an Oxford Museum, which is far from straightforward.

programme.title: The Wake
programme.desc: A group of friends attends the wake of a child they accidentally killed in their car. Once in the wake, they find themselves trapped and stalked by a masked assailant.

programme.title: Arachnicide
programme.desc: After successfully taking down the drug operation, a task force composed of six of the best soldiers from different Special Forces Units is called on for an important mission in Albania. There, they discover that an incubator has accelerated the growth of plants needed for the manufacturing of illegal drugs and narcotics which is protected by a group of colossal spiders.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Sydney- Sydney Harbor, a sightseeing cruise followed by a fast jet boat ride that makes some exciting 360 spins under the Harbour bridge. Laura climbs to the top of the Sydney Harbour Bridge - a once-in-a-lifetime experience indeed - before she visits her favorite attraction, the legendary Sydney Opera House. Numerous first-rate attractions, world-class museums, excellent shopping, and a year-round calendar of free outdoor events.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Giving Back-Join Elizabeth Stanton and her celebrity friends in this very special episode of Great Big World as they travel to Vietnam, Africa, Nicaragua and Nevada on a life-changing voluntourism mission.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Paris- The Hotel des Invalides, where Napoleon is buried under the dome the Palace de Royales, the old royal palace, the famed Paris Opera House, and the Grand Dame of Gothic Architecture - Notre Dame Cathedral. Plus, the Musée Rodin, the Georges Pompidou Museum and the Musée National Picasso for fans of Modern Art, and, finally, The Louvre. - once the royal palace in France.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Magic and Illusion- Elizabeth Stanton and her friend and actor, Taylor Gray, discover life behind the scenes of the award-winning television series, Masters of Illusion! Witness daring escape, mind-blowing mentalists, incredible illusionists, levitations, transformations, and so much more, all performed live on stage in Hollywood!

programme.title: Jack Rio
programme.desc: A famous actor in Los Angeles tries to escape his on-screen persona, the T.V. character that has made him famous, and find himself again, while a string of murders seem to follow in his wake. Is it the work of an obsessed fan? Or something far worse?

programme.title: Street Magic
programme.desc: The One With The Needle Through The Hand- Jonathan Pendragon shows international superstar Ronn Moss his "feet" of magic! Plus Trigg Watson and his tablet of wonder turns images into reality, Eric Ross actually shoves a needle through his hand, Michael Turco re-creates the daily news, Rich Manley leaves a burning impression and Michael Grandinetti levitates himself over Hollywood Boulevard completely surrounded by a hundred witnesses.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: Nation of Language talk about their newfound exposure during the pandemic and new album. Kah-Lo talks about growing as an artist and plans for new music. Zella Day performs live and more.

programme.title: Strike
programme.desc: The first feature film by the director of Battleship Potemkin, Sergei Eisenstein’s STRIKE is a visual tour-de-force that employs dynamic editing and experimental camerawork to dramatize the saga of a bitterly-fought factory strike in 1903. programme.title: Greece! - Greece! From the Mountains to the Shoreline, 5. Thrace
programme.desc: From lush green forests to snow-capped mountains, from towering cliffs to bare sandbars, the Greek islands are a land of unmatched natural beauty. The islands also have seen Europe’s earliest civilizations, its philosophical founders and its greatest battles. State-of-the-art aerial filming technology takes the audience to hidden coves, volcano craters, and whitewashed monasteries. On the ground olive-farmers, monks, shepherds, ferrymen and sculptors - ordinary people living in exceptional places - give original insights into historical buildings, sacred places and, last not least, culinary traditions that have affected Europe for centuries.

programme.title: 24 Hours To Kill
programme.desc: A plane bound for Athens is forced to spend 24 hours in Beirut after an engine failure. A member of the crew gets mixed up in transporting stolen goods, which brings him to the attention of a ruthless smuggler. It falls to the pilot to protect his friend from the criminal and his gang.

programme.title: The Medicine Buddha
programme.desc: This unique documentary is a portrait of one of the leaders of the Buddhist faith in Mongolia: Khamba Lama Natsagdorj. A fascinating individual, who masterfully bridges faith and science, he is a national treasure in Mongolia. He has not taken a holiday for 26 years as life is focused on helping people in his physical world and all humanity. He is the Head Lama at the “Manba Datsan Monastery of The Medicine Buddha” in Mongolia and is the Chief medical doctor at The Medical Training Centre of Mongolian Medicine in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. He also teaches and treats patients around the world with traditional Mongolian Herbal Medicine. We take the audience on a journey through the eyes of Khamba Lama Natsagdorj who is a close friend and former student of the Dali Lama. We witness one of the Worlds most unique rich cultures through the eyes of a true WORLD WISDOM KEEPER. From his life and work in the city, experiencing the celebrations of LUNAR NEW YEAR we travel with LAMA on an epic Pilgrimage to his remote homeland.

programme.title: Christmas Oranges

programme.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
programme.desc: Sensitive young Toby is deeply saddened when his doted father John, who buried himself in work when widowed, dumps the boy for weeks, including Christmas, on his stern old mother, grim widow Ellen. Beside the stuck-up lady's driver-butler Henry, Toby finds comfort only with a velveteen cuddly rabbit and other animal toys in his father's childhood room, which come to life in his mind when he plays with them. Drama over rabbit and boy stirs crucial emotions in both family and fantasy toy land.

programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 37-38
programme.desc: Little Fish Grow Up Runaway Robot Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

programme.title: Zumbers - Season 1 - Episodes 113-119
programme.desc: Limon | Worm | Carrot | Clock | Bull | Glasses | Elephant Five characters, accompanied by their inseparable vehicle-gadget, sets out on a journey where the main purpose is to eat, one by one, the delicious round pastries scattered around the garden.

programme.title: Alex - Season 1 - Episodes 21-26
programme.desc: Anteater | Ostrich | Toucan | Gazelle | Tortoise | Elephant Alex is a curious 5 year old boy who wants to learn from the world around him. Throughout the four seasons of the series he will discover where fruits and vegetables come from, what animals are in the sea and in the jungle and the sound of musical instruments.

programme.title: Munki and Trunk - Season 1 - Episodes 1-3
programme.desc: Queen Of The Swingers | Prickly Situation | Sweet Mayhem Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.desc: From episode 49 to 54 The Reds are tiny creatures who are part of a community that lives together in a tree belonging to a fantastic world. The Reds love to gather and draw pictures and in each chapter, the ogre Boom has to guess what the Reds are drawing on the ground.

programme.desc: Castle | Puzzle | Drums In this new session of Telmo and Tula, our little friends will teach us, easily and with materials available to everyone, how to make crafts and toys in the most fun and simple way possible.

programme.title: Raindrop - Season 1 - Raindrop the builder
programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. Surrounded by her friends Vaporón (a cloud) and Frigote (a cube of ice), she will live many adventures and defeat a germ, the evil bacteria, in her attempt to destroy the environment.

programme.title: Molang - Season 1 - Episodes 36-42
programme.desc: The Explorers The Football Player The Robot A Friendly Rugby Game The Firemen The Keys The Lighthouse Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Bugged - Season 1 - Episodes 40-42
programme.desc: A whistle with a double whammy Sticky situation Safari Follow our hero Murphy in his doomed quest to capture the ultimate prize: a bug called Puck. But, for Murphy, nothing ever works the way it should and he has big competition: Blat Jack, a super bounty hunter. Everything that can go wrong will go wrong! Relive the glory days of burlesque cartoons!

programme.title: Monk Little Dog - Season 1 - Episodes 43-52

programme.title: Mouk - Season 1 - Episodes 39-40
programme.desc: Birdsong Dinosaur Trail Mouk and Chavapa are two globe-trotters: they travel around the world riding their bikes! From Tokyo to New York, from Australia to Madagascar and through Greece, these two friends meet inhabitants from all over the planet… and because nowhere feels quite like home, adventure is always knocking at their door! Climb on a bike with them and discover this realistic, modern and colourful world. Amazing people, unbelievable landscapes, and unknown customs: our two travellers will discover many different countries together. Beyond the differences, they share beautiful experiences and make friends everywhere!

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Breakup
programme.desc: The night Abigail (Christina Ricci) meets Ben (Hamish Linklater) at a bar, they jokingly come up with a list of things to do before their imagined breakup, knowingly full well they’ll never even start a relationship. But when the joke turns in to a one-night stand things become a whole lot more complicated.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of an international finance deal in New York and Peru, 'The Deal' is an intense political drama which explores how far people will go to get what they want.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: 1879, nine-year-old Maria Sautuola and her father, Marcelino, discover the first cave art and accomplished paintings of galloping bison. But Maria's mother, devout Conchita, is disturbed at the idea that prehistoric savages could have created such magnificent art. The Catholic Church sees this as an attack on Biblical truth. And Carthailac, the leading prehistorian, condemns Marcelino and his discovery as fakes. The family is thrown into crisis and the cave locked up. It takes all their love for each other to find a way through to redemption and recognition.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Full of shock turns, moments of horrific injury, polar bear action and tense emotional scenes, Arctic will keep your hands clenched to your chair until its brilliant, breathless conclusion. Mads Mikkelsen gives a tour de force performance as a pilot whose plane has crashed in a remote corner of the Arctic. Stranded in the wilderness he uses his ingenuity to survive. When about to receive his long-awaited rescue, an explosive accident means his opportunity is lost and the dire situation further complicated. The tragic turn of events, involving another crash survivor forces the pilot to make a perilous choice between the relative safety of his camp and a deadly trek into the unknown.

programme.title: After the Fall (2014)
programme.desc: When Bill, a family man and hardworking insurance adjuster, is fired from his job, he falls into quiet despair. He still leaves the house every morning pretending to go to work while secretly on a frantic hunt for a new job. Almost by accident, Bill begins a life of crime. Frightened and unsure of himself to begin with, he soon becomes more skilled in his new line of work, targeting those he believes deserve it most. However a close friend, who is a cop, begins to suspect that there may be more to Bill than first appears.

programme.title: Jimmy P
programme.desc: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.

programme.title: Dark Minds
programme.desc: A twisted psychological thriller about a man haunted by his past. After Josh (Zachary Quinto – 'Star Trek') experiences a series of hallucinations involving his brother (Jon Hamm – 'Baby Driver'), he places himself in the care of a young therapist Emily (Jenny Slate – 'Obvious Child'). As Emily is forced to wade deeper and deeper into Josh’s psyche, she fights to discover the truth.

programme.title: Ninja: Shadow Of A Tear
programme.desc: Scott Adkins returns as Casey Bowman, who is now the sensei of a successful dojo, married to the beautiful Namiko, and expecting their first baby. But when Casey returns home one day to find someone has brutally killed Namiko and their unborn child, bereft, Casey has only one thing left to live for…Revenge.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.
